It makes submitting receipts and creating expense reports quicker and easier by doing a lot of the work for you. <p>Tired of receipts piling up? Get expense reports started sooner, so you can get reimbursed faster. Here’s how it works:</p><p>1. SUBMIT RECEIPTS ANYTIME, ANYWHERE – IDEALLY WHEN YOU’VE JUST MADE A PURCHASE, OR BEFORE THE RECEIPT GETS STASHED AWAY. EXPENSEIT PRO GIVES YOU THREE EASY WAYS TO SUBMIT RECEIPTS:<br>•Simply take a photo of a receipt using the ExpenseIt Pro app. iOS users click “use” and Android users click the check mark to have the receipt photo analyzed and turned into an expense.<br>•Use a receipt photo you’ve already taken; open it in the ExpenseIt Pro app, and click “use” to have it analyzed and turned into an expense.<br>•If a receipt has been emailed to you, forward it to receipts@ExpenseIt.com; after it’s analyzed, it will be waiting for you in Concur Expense.</p><p>2. REVIEW YOUR ANALYZED RECEIPTS – OR HAVE THEM AUTOMATICALLY SENT TO CONCUR EXPENSE – AFTER THEY’RE TURNED INTO EXPENSES:<br>•To review analyzed receipts first, you can get notified when they’re ready by choosing email or push notifications in the app’s settings. After you review or make changes, simply click “export” to send the receipts to Concur Expense.<br>•To have your analyzed receipts sent to Concur Expense without reviewing first, select “automatically export expenses to Concur” in the app’s settings, and they’ll be waiting for you in Concur Expense – where you can also make changes as you’re finishing up your expense report.</p><p>3. GO TO CONCUR EXPENSE, ADD YOUR EXPENSES TO A REPORT AND YOU’RE DONE. <br>•With everything in one place, you’ll see that ExpenseIt Pro has selected the expense category, matched receipts with credit card charges, attached the receipt photo, and even itemized your hotel bills for you.<br>•Simply add each expense to a Concur Expense report, and submit your expense report to get href="/store/apps/details?id=com.uk.tsl.rfidxplorer" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.uk.tsl.rfidxplorer" title="RFID Explorer"> 533.    RFID Explorer  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Technology+Solutions+UK+Ltd" title="Technology Solutions UK Ltd">Technology Solutions UK Ltd</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.uk.tsl.rfidxplorer"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS51ay50c2wucmZpZHhwbG9yZXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  RFID Explorer will help you explore the performance, functionality and versatility of Technology Solutions’ high performance 1128 Bluetooth UHF RFID Reader.<br> <br>Technology Solutions (UK) Ltd (TSL) specialises in the design, development and manufacture of Radio Frequency Identification Devices (RFID) and other multi-technology mobile device peripherals that are used to track products, assets, data or personnel. RFID devices are typically used in transport logistics, stock inventory control, and collection of personal data and attendance.<br> <br>RFID Explorer uses TSL's sophisticated, parameterised, ASCII protocol which provides developers with a powerful set of commands to carry out complex UHF RFID transponder operations in a simple, easy-to-grasp way. Using these simple pre-configured ASCII commands, the 1128 UHF RFID reader can be rapidly integrated into applications resulting in un-paralleled levels of productivity.<p>Features: </p><p>▪	Inventory - Rapidly generate a list of unique, nearby transponders (tags) and review a summary of scan operations<br>▪	Read/Write - Inspect information stored in the memory banks of a chosen tag. Create customised tags by writing new information to a chosen tag memory bank. Use the Transcript to discover the underlying ASCII protocol command parameters that power these operations. <br>▪	Commands - See the reader execute a wide selection of ASCII Commands while viewing all the detail of the data packets sent and received from the device. Query the reader for information such as firmware and hardware versions, region information, battery level and scan 1D and 2D barcodes (requires antenna with 2D imager option to be fitted). Use the in-built Command descriptions to understand the power and flexibility of TSL's unique ASCII Protocol.<br>▪	Find - Locate a specific tag with the handheld reader aided by the graphical representations of tag signal strength levels.</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.uk.tsl.rfidxplorer" aria-hidden="true" Manager">HandWallet Expense Manager</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" 為了使用這個小工具，您必須先安裝掌上錢包-<br>一個免費的專業消費管理可以幫助您控制您的開支，賬目，帳單和預算。<p>“會計”是一個免費的小部件，讓你隨時隨地在手機主屏幕看到掌上錢包管理的帳戶餘額。</p><p>有時由於安卓操作系統中的一個錯誤，你需要安裝任何部件（不只是這一個）兩次你才能看到它出現在窗口小部件列表（或安裝並啟動您的移動設備）。</p><p>•免費給家庭用戶<br>•顯示你每個帳戶的當前餘額<br>•顯示紅色透支！</p><p>選項：<br>•可控制貨幣的圖（美元，歐元等）<br>•可控制日期（今天，明天，從今天起一個星期，依此類推）。<br>•控制賬戶顯示：銀行帳戶，信用卡，現金，等等..<br>•字體大小，顏色，背景和日期格式<br>•支持多貨幣交易<br>•一鍵輸入新的消費<br>•一鍵啟動掌上錢包應用程序</p><p>為什麼會計窗口小部件是比Excel更好？<br>因為它是更簡單，同時也有更多的選擇。<br>因為它會給你的全面性的概念而不僅僅是銀行或信用卡狀態。</p><p>為什麼要使用會計部件？<br>因為這是最好的消費部件。而且，因為我們已經有10年創造消費管理和會計軟件的經驗，並確切地知道為什麼大多數人都希望管理費用，但只有少數成功。</p><p>如何開始？<br>1。下載掌上錢包免費的應用程序，並啟動它。檢查您的語言，國家和貨幣是正確的。掌上錢包將默認定義3個賬戶：現金，銀行帳戶和信用卡。<br>2。下載並安裝“會計的窗口小部件”。然後您的手機主屏幕裡找一個空行，並把它放在那裡。如果你看不到的小部件出現在部件列表中，請重新安裝或重新啟動。<br>3。按下“菜單”鍵+“行動”選項卡中的“新”，並記錄您的第一個消費。</p><p>English:<br>IN ORDER TO USE THIS WIDGET YOU MUST INSTALL FIRST HANDWALLET -<br>a free professional expense manager that helps you to control your expense, accounts, bills and budget.</p><p>"Accounting" is a small free widget that lets you see anytime your accounts balances managed by the HandWallet app on the home screen of the phone.</p><p>Sometimes DUE TO A BUG IN THE ANDROID OS you need to INSTALL ANY WIDGET (not just this one) TWICE before you see it in the widget list (or install and boot your device). </p><p>• FREE for home users<br>• Show you your current balance in each of your accounts<br>• Show overdraft in red!</p><p>Options:<br>• Can control the currency of the graph (Dollar, Euro etc)<br>• Can control the date (today, tomorrow, a week from today and so on).<br>• Control what accounts to show: bank account, credit card, cash and more..<br>• Font size, colors, background and date format</p><p>• Support multi currencies transactions<br>• Enter new expense in one click<br>• Start the HandWallet app in one click</p><p>Why Accounting Widget is better than Excel?<br>• Because it is more simple and yet has more options<br>• Because it will give you the full picture and not just the bank or the credit card status</p><p>Why to use Accounting Widget?<br>Because it's the best expense widget. And because we are creating expense manager and accounting software for 10 years and know exactly why most people want to manage expense but only few succeed.</p><p>How to start?<br>1. Download the HandWallet app for free and run it. Check that your language, country and currency are correct. HandWallet will define 3 accounts by default: cash, bank account and credit card.</p><p>2. Download and install the "Accounting Widget". Then find an empty line in the home screen of your phone and put it there. IF YOU DO NOT SEE THE WIDGET IN THE WIDGETS LIST INSTALL AGAIN OR REBOOT.</p><p>3. Press the "Menu" button + "new" in the "Actions" tab and log your first expense.</p><p>How to control budget?<br>Press the "data" button then categories. Select your category, for example "car expense". Press the "advanced" button and select the type of budget: fixed budget, summarized budget and so on. Book Keeper Accounting  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Just+Apps+Pvt.+Ltd." title="Just Apps Pvt. Ltd.">Just Apps Pvt. Ltd.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.bookkeeper"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGAoWEhQKDmNvbS5ib29ra2VlcGVyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Book Keeper Accounting is a financial/business accounting app for small and medium businesses. It’s simple user interface allows you to send invoices &amp; estimates, track expenses &amp; receipts, manage inventory, view &amp; send various reports and much more. It's a complete accounting package which helps you maintain your company books and do all company/business/financial accounting.<p>Try the app FREE for 45 days, after which you need to purchase subscription (starting $70/year or INR 2000/year)<br>Book Keeper Accounting is Tally™ compatible. Sync your company accounts with Tally™ by importing existing Tally™ Masters into Book Keeper, and exporting Masters and Transactions from Book Keeper to Tally™<br>Book Keeper supports online syncing of data across multiple devices via Dropbox</p><p>Unlimited features: Create unlimited accounts, inventory, companies, transactions. No limit!!<br>Inventory Management: Manage your entire inventory<br>No Internet connection required: Offline accounting app, manage accounts on the go<br>Stand-alone app: Maintain financial accounting books, no dependency on other software, no sign up required<br>No prior accounting know-how: Maintain accounting books with ease, no accounting/bookkeeping knowledge required<br>Online Sync: Sync your company data across multiple devices via Dropbox</p><p>It is based on professional accounting principles to ensure balanced books and accurate reports.<br>Just enter your daily vouchers and let Book Keeper does all the double-entry accounting.</p><p>Accounting<br>• Easy, real accounting<br>• Accountant approved<br>• Maintain individual ledgers/accounts<br>• Automatic computation of profit/loss<br>• Reconcile bank statements</p><p>Transactions<br>• Create sales, purchase, receipts, payments, banking transactions (single-entry &amp; double-entry mode)<br>• Generate invoices and mail them to customers<br>• Enter tax vouchers, view tax computation and file tax returns<br>• Keep track of paid/unpaid invoice, outstanding receivable/payable with aging analysis</p><p>Order generation<br>• Generate sales order, issue purchase order<br> <br>Inventory Management<br>• Create individual inventory items with your own units of measure.<br>• Record purchase/sale/purchase return/sales return voucher entries of these items.<br>• Automatic valuation of closing inventory based on Average Cost (AVCO) Method.<br> <br>Reports<br>• View various financial accounting reports (Trial Balance, P&amp;L A/C, Trading A/C, Balance Sheet etc.) which are automatically generated<br>• View detailed reports of each inventory item<br>• View summary of all inventory item</p><p>Permissions explained:<br>Storage: For storing company backups and reports (in PDF, CSV, HTML format) on your SD card.<br>Network Communication: For interacting with our servers when you login with your email ID (with which you purchased the subscription).<br>Contact Information: For fetching contacts while creating an account.<br>Phone Status &amp; Identity: For linking your email ID (with which you purchased the subscription) with your unique device ID.<br>Call/SMS Phone Number: For calling or sending SMS to customers/suppliers</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.bookkeeper" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.bookkeeper" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 4.3 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 85.09457588195801%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.bookkeeper"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGAoWEhQKDmNvbS5ib29ra2VlcGVyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </span> </div> </div>   </div></div>  </div> </div>   </div></div><div class="secondary-content"></div><div> <script>(function(){var fu=true;var pt='商業類熱門免費下載 - Google Play Android 應用程式';var ab='';var lmt='';var curl='https://play.google.com/store/apps/category/BUSINESS/collection/topselling_free?authuser\0750';var nbp='[\42https://play.google.com/store/apps/category/BUSINESS/collection/topselling_free?authuser\\u003d0\42,null,\04260\42,\04260\42,\0420\42]\n';var sc='';var pgj=false;var di='apps_topselling_free';var du=0;window.updateClient = function(){if (fu){if (pt){upt(pt);}
